short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable picture-in-picture mode for any element of the webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a popup browser window with the contents of any selected element of the webpage, akin to the builtin Chrome picture-in-picture viewer for video.
